Text: When you say " I wish I had his "Lectures on Physics" when I was a student in the early 1950's.", do you mean the ones recorded on the CD set "Six Easy Pieces?  Because, if you do, I can transcribe & upload them for you as a courtesy for your having uploaded this one.  Just reply here & I will get about doing it.
From reading the description of this a/b, I surmise an interesting paradox in deed; one can be ultra-intelligent and "cool" simultaneously.
